recycle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to put used objects or materials through a special process so that they can be used again
recycle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We take all our bottles to be recycled.
recycle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new
recycle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.

recycle.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: We recycle all our cans and bottles.
